meanings.definition: The study of the human body and its structure.
meanings.sent1: In somatologies, researchers explore how our bodies work.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use somatologies to understand the anatomy of the human body.
meanings.sent3: Learning about somatologies can help us appreciate the complexity of our own bodies.
meanings.sent4: The somatologies of the human body are like a detailed map of our physical form.
meanings.sent5: Studying somatologies is like unraveling the secrets of our own biology.

meanings.definition: The physical characteristics and traits of an individual or group.
meanings.sent1: Her somatologies include her height, weight, and hair color.
meanings.sent2: The somatologies of different ethnic groups can vary significantly.
meanings.sent3: His somatologies make him easily recognizable in a crowd.
meanings.sent4: The somatologies of the team members complement each other's strengths.
meanings.sent5: The somatologies of the twins were so similar that they often confused people.
